snippet: How does one have a new take on a subject that is a single, prolific, wildly imaginative composer like John Cage? The Focus! Festival gives it a try.
abstract: Allan Kozinn reviews Sounds Reimagined: John Cage at 100, celebration of imaginative composer that is subject of Julliard School's 2012 Focus! Festival.
lead_paragraph: How does one have a new take on a subject that is a single, prolific, wildly imaginative composer like John Cage? The Focus! Festival gives it a try.

headline.seo: ‘Sounds Reimagined: John Cage at 100’ From Juilliard
headline.main: Cage Echoes, In His Music And on Video
headline.print_headline: Cage Echoes, In His Music And on Video
